name: Rosco
description: Rosco is a retro-styled oscilloscope-themed robot, known for its vibrant red color and sleek design. It is equipped with a unique feature - a screen displaying a cute cat animation. With its foundry arms and legs, Rosco is built for durability and precision. To add a touch of style, it sports trendy shades. As a member of the WebtrES club, Rosco is skilled in web technologies and enjoys exploring the digital realm. It has various ability scores to complement its capabilities, including hp, charisma, constitution, dexterity, intelligence, strength, and wisdom. Rosco is a quirky and charismatic robot, always ready to assist and entertain.
